activities:
Perfecto Mobile uses the information collected from our Web sites and Services Platform to perform the services requested.  For example, we may use this information to:

Send requested product or service information
Send product updates
Respond to customer service requests
Administer your account
Send newsletters
Send marketing communications
Respond to questions and concerns
Improve our Web site/Services Platform and marketing efforts
Conduct research and analysis
Respond to inquiries regarding career opportunities
Complete purchases

personaldata: data collected directly on the Internet.
recoursemech: private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the Safe Harbor framework - TRUSTe
